member.name: T:FlatRedBall.Glue.StateInterpolation.TweeningFunction
member.summary: Delegate used for all tweening functions.
member.param: How much time has passed since the start of the tween. If this is called over a period of time then this value will increase.
The starting value value for tweening. For example this may be the X position of an object.
The value when the tween is finished. For example this may be the ending X position of an object.
How long (in seconds) that the tween will last.
